entities.name: crabbe
entities.description: Crabbe is mentioned as one of the people trying to distract Harry Potter. He is described as pointing his wand at a mountain of old furniture and shouting 'Descendo!'.

entities.name: goyle
entities.description: Goyle is mentioned as one of the people trying to distract Harry Potter. He is described as grunting and saying that they were hiding in the corridor outside.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is mentioned as someone who virtually lived in the Room of Hidden Things all last year. He is described as knowing how to get into the room.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is mentioned as trying to distract Crabbe and Goyle by asking them questions. He is also mentioned as looking for a 'die-dum'.

entities.name: ron weasley
entities.description: Ron Weasley is mentioned as calling out to Harry Potter from the other side of the wall.

entities.name: the horcrux
entities.description: The Horcrux is mentioned as sitting lopsided upon a bust. It is also described as something that Harry Potter wants to get his hands on before the fight breaks out.

relationships.description: Harry Potter is trying to get his hands on the Horcrux before the fight breaks out.
Malfoy virtually lived in the Room of Hidden Things all last year.
